definition: A term commonly used to refer to individuals who are undergoing vocational training or apprenticeships in various fields, typically in a professional or technical setting. It is often used to describe young adults who are learning a specific trade or profession through a combination of practical work experience and theoretical education.

examples.german: Viele Azubis absolvieren eine duale Ausbildung.
examples.english: Many apprentices complete a dual education.

examples.german: Azubis erhalten eine Vergütung während ihrer Ausbildung.
examples.english: Apprentices receive a salary during their training.

examples.german: Die Anzahl der Azubis in Deutschland ist in den letzten Jahren gestiegen.
examples.english: The number of apprentices in Germany has increased in recent years.
Apprentices work in various professional fields.
